Parameters: int: Optional error code for specific implementation.
CharSequence: Optional error message for specific implementation.
onError(int, java.lang.CharSequence).Description: notify media has error. The Host could show error dialog.

Parameters: boolean: True for buffering start, false otherwise.
onBufferingStateChanged(boolean).Description: notify media starts/stops buffering/preparing. The Host could start or stop progress bar.

onVideoSizeChanged(int, int).Description: Size of the video changes, the Host should adjust SurfaceView's layout width and height.

ClassDesc: Optional Client that implemented by PlaybackGlueHost to respond to player event.
